markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dead Reckoning](/Feats.aspx?ID=2219) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 40</row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871); Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a [compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16) or see the sky above. You immediately intuit which direction is north (assuming the concept of north exists at your current location).
name: Dead Reckoning
prerequisite: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Trained in Survival
